samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to group based on the different categories with individual header and icon support using JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control.

samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source and fetch data from remote data service in the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control.

samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with data source in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Disabled Items
samples.description: This example demonstrates the disabled items in the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control pop-up list using the template.

samples.name: Popup Resize
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to resize the appearance of popup in the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list .

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the filtering functionalities works based on the typed characters in the JavaScript(ES5) drop-down list control.

samples.name: Virtualization
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to use virtualization support of the JavaScript(ES5) dropdownlist control.

samples.name: Cascading
